[Page Title: Stack's Evening Eats Mt. Pleasant, SC]

New American Southern
Warm, Inviting Neighborhood Bistro 
Located in Mt. Pleasant, Stack's Evening Eats is a modern American bistro from owners Darcy and Chef Patrick Stack.

Phone

(843) 388-6968

Location

1440 Ben Sawyer BoulevardSte 1107Mount Pleasant, SC 29464

Hours

5:00pm – 9:30pm
Monday – Thursday 
5:00pm – 10:00pm
Friday 
5:00pm – 10:00pm
Saturday Closed Sundays 
Snapper

Bibb Lettuce Wedge Salad

Tuna Nachos

Scallop Salad

Grilled Salmon

Starters

Marinated Mixed Olives

Housemade Fried Pickles

Truffle-Asiago Fries

Fried Jumbo Shrimp

Citrus Slaw, Peach-Horseradish Marmalade, Toasted Coconut

Tuna Nachos*

Wontons, Avocado, Wasabi & Ginger Sauces

Fresh Mozzarella Stuffed Risotto Fritters

Crispy Brussels Sprouts

Smoked Tomato-Herb Dipping Sauce

Cornmeal Fried Oysters

Bill’s Remoulade

Shrimp & Grits

Andouille Sausage, Tomatoes, Vegetable Gravy, Edisto Island Grits
